name: Touch The Football
description:
Simple rule of this game is “Do not touch the bomb”. it”s seems easy then try it to play.
Click the character as fast as possible.
The mechanism for this game is one of the simplest  1) Click on a character as fast as possible.
2) Do not touch bomb otherwise you will be lost the game.
3) If you miss to touch any character then your life level will be decrease by one.
4) If you want to increase your life level then, click on heart character. 5) You can see your current game score.
6) you can select level of game speed.

Category of game mode is given below:
1-Car
2-Coin
3-Diamond
4-Football
5-Heritage
6-Fashion
